Package ca.nait.dmit.domin

Class BMI

java.lang.Object
ca.nait.dmit.domin.BMI
public class BMI extends Object
This class is used to calculate a person's body mass index (BMI) and their BMI Category.

    • bmi

      public double bmi()
      Calculate the body mass index (BMI) using the weight and height of the person. The BMI of a person is calculated using the formula: BMI = 700 * weight / (height * height) where weight is in pounds and height is in inches.
      Returns:
      the body mass index (BMI) value of the person

    • bmiCategory

      public String bmiCategory()
      Determines the BMI Category of the person using their BMI value and comparing it against the following table. 3. ...... 3 of 4 1/13/2016 5:21 PM
      BMI Range BMI Category
      < 18.5 underweight
      >= 18.5 and < 25 normal
      >= 25 and < 30 overweight
      >= 30 obese
      Returns:
      one of following: underweight, normal, overweight, obese.
